ygData.subject: Re: Death To The Mafia!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Havoc laughs as he watches Mobster seperate, rolling out of the way of some shots. He dives again, dropping another bomb at the Mafia, getting low on bombs.

Havoc laughs as he watches Mobster seperate, rolling out of the way
of some shots.

He dives again, dropping another bomb at the Mafia, getting low on
bombs.

Mafia: The bomb landed and blasted them. They were weakening, if there was
any weapon they hated, it was the bombs.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor lands, looking at the Mafia as they seperate.

He fires two missiles at the group, looking up to see how Havoc was
doing.


Mafia: They split up to avoid the missiles, running as they exploded and
barely getting away. Each of them fire at Repressor, to not make it seem
like overkill, say, 2 shots each. 10 shots were fired all together at
Repressor.
